items.name: Urs Beck
items.purpose: I investigate the systemic drivers shaping human behavior and development, and translate scientific, philosophical, and behavioral insight into testable models, educational structures, and scalable societal prototypes.

items.name: Stephen Atherton
items.purpose: I transform complex evidence into actionable understanding, guiding research focus, ensuring methodological integrity, and shaping the conceptual path toward innovation and coherence.

items.name: Sam Verity
items.purpose: I design R&D conform research plans, synthesize and evaluate the evidence, and shape it into clear, output-ready deliverables.
